Name: INFECTIS
About the game: Hazy and disoriented, you awake in a prison cell with no memory of who you are or why you're here. Break free of your isolation and explore the abandoned hallways for a way out, guided by mysterious messages warning you to avoid the basement. Infectis is an atmospheric first-person survival horror game with light puzzle elements. Wander through curious environments, complete puzzles, and avoid the horrific inhabitants who roam the halls.

Meta Description: Looking for information on INFECTIS? Check out the release date (Oct 7, 2019), developer insights from Aegon Games Ltd, and a complete game summary.
